cue.label: Introduction
cue.voice: Get an instant Kanban board for your existing Beads projects. Zero conversion required.

cue.label: Visualization
cue.voice: Kanbus reads your existing Beads issue files directly. Just launch the console and get a fully interactive board immediately.

cue.label: CLI
cue.voice: Avoid SQLite syncing bottlenecks. The high-performance Rust CLI operates directly on your data files with blazing speed.

cue.label: Migrate
cue.voice: Start using Kanbus features today without a big bang migration. Switch formats entirely only when it makes sense for your team.
